Package com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities

Class EnemyShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities.EnemyShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable
    public class EnemyShip
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    A class which creates enemy ships which follow the player and try to kill them. And it holds relevant data about them such as position, damage scalar and if it is frozen. This was added in assessment 2 to fulfil the requirement of combat enemy ships - USR23.
